title: Now even my best friend  got a Girlfriend
body:
Now I can't even have this to feel better, I'm so lonely

https://cyanime.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/aoyama.jpg

When everything decided to go this way, it's painful

http://s18.postimg.org/kv4bu3e61/vlcsnap_2013_03_05_20h31m58s216.jpg

A laifu without a waifu is not a real laifu

http://i.imgur.com/JkazgpG.jpg[/img]
